Augment.Name: Sealed in Undeath
Augment.Description: Sealed in Undeath: This item seethes with a sealed power. It can have its power unsealed at the Ritual Table, adding one effect. Attempting to add another will remove the original.

Augment.Name: Sealed in Gloom
Augment.Description: Sealed in Gloom: This item's true nature is hard to determine through all this gloom. It can have its power unsealed at the Augmentation Altar, adding one effect. Attempting to add another will remove the original.

Augment.Name: Strength +15
Augment.Description: Strength +15: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +15 enhancement bonus to Strength.

Augment.Name: Constitution +15
Augment.Description: Constitution +15: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +15 Enhancement bonus to Constitution.

Augment.Name: Dexterity +15
Augment.Description: Dexterity +15: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +15 Enhancement bonus to Dexterity.

Augment.Name: Intelligence +15
Augment.Description: Intelligence +15: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +15 Enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

Augment.Name: Wisdom +15
Augment.Description: Wisdom +15: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +15 Enhancement bonus to Wisdom.

Augment.Name: Charisma +15
Augment.Description: Charisma +15: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +15 Enhancement bonus to Charisma.

Augment.Name: Insightful Strength +7
Augment.Description: Insightful Strength +7: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +15 Insightful bonus to Strength.

Augment.Name: Insightful Constitution +7
Augment.Description: Insightful Constitution +7: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +7 Insightful bonus to Constitution.

Augment.Name: Insightful Dexterity +7
Augment.Description: Insightful Dexterity +7: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +7 Insightful bonus to Dexterity.

Augment.Name: Insightful Intelligence +7
Augment.Description: Insightful Intelligence +7: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +7 Insightful bonus to Intelligence.

Augment.Name: Insightful Wisdom +7
Augment.Description: Insightful Wisdom +7: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +7 Insightful bonus to Wisdom.

Augment.Name: Insightful Charisma +7
Augment.Description: Insightful Charisma +7: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +7 Insightful bonus to Charisma.

Augment.Name: Quality Strength +3
Augment.Description: Quality Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +15 Quality bonus to Strength.

Augment.Name: Quality Constitution +3
Augment.Description: Quality Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 Quality bonus to Constitution.

Augment.Name: Quality Dexterity +3
Augment.Description: Quality Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 Quality bonus to Dexterity.

Augment.Description: Quality Intelligence +3: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +3 Quality bonus to Intelligence.

Augment.Description: Quality Wisdom +3: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +3 Quality bonus to Wisdom.
